title: Central Dogma, Protein Synthesis in Eukaryotes 1

content.question: Explain the role of each of the following in protein synthesis in eukaryotic cells. • RNA polymerase • Spliceosomes (snRNPs) • Codons • Ribosomes • tRNA

frqParts.text: Explain the role of each of the following in protein synthesis in eukaryotic cells. • RNA polymerase • Spliceosomes (snRNPs) • Codons • Ribosomes • tRNA
